customizeViewDescription: These settings affect all the Kaana accounts on this browser.
customizeViewLanguageDescription: Select the language you want to use on Noted.
customizeViewThemeDescription: Select the theme you want to use on Noted.
remindersEmptyDescription: There are no reminders, but you can start creating reminders by clicking the 'New Reminder' button.
notesEmptyDescription: You don't have any notes yet.
tasksEmptyDescription: You don't have any tasks yet.
archivedEmptyDescription: You have not archived any items yet. Start archiving your content to keep your space organized and tidy. Use the 'Archive' feature to store and retrieve items when you need them. Happy archiving!
trashEmptyDescription: You have not trashed any items yet. Start trashing your content to keep your space organized and tidy. Use the 'Trash' feature to store and retrieve items when you need them. Happy trashing!
